item.title: 印度主要反对党印度国大党指责印度总理莫迪领导的政府试图在财政上 "削弱 "该党，而此时距离印度投票还有数周时间

item.title: 英国政府上个月的借贷高于预期，这使得英国财政大臣杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）在整个财政年度的预算预计将超额完成。
item.description:

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 在中国政府重新征收进口税导致俄罗斯煤炭供应竞争力下降之后，中国在今年前两个月对俄罗斯煤炭的采购量出现下滑。
item.description:

item.title: 汇丰银行（HSBC）的一项即时调查显示，受制造业增长的推动，印度 3 月份的经济活动有所增长。

item.title: 据《曼谷邮报》报道，泰国国王玛哈-哇集拉隆功（Maha Vajiralongkorn）的一个儿子获得了政府颁发的身份证和泰国护照，并打算在国外生活近三十年后搬回泰国。
item.description:
A son of Thailand’s King Maha Vajiralongkorn has secured a government-issued identification card and a Thai passport, and now intends to move back to the country after living abroad for nearly three decades, according to the Bangkok Post https://t.co/3qoiMdxTK8

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 鲍威尔和上田的鹰派确实像鸽子一样飞翔，@johnauthers 说。美联储和日本央行都不想表现得太强势，但也不想被 "颠簸 "推来推去
item.description:
Powell and Ueda's hawks sure fly like doves, says @johnauthers. Neither the Fed nor the Bank of Japan want to come on too strong, but nor do they wish to be pushed around by 'bumps' https://t.co/nqf4pof3gc

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 阿联酋试图通过广泛投资来获得地缘政治影响力。在非洲，这意味着认捐的资金甚至超过了中国。

item.title: 越南可能没有像许多民主国家那样两极分化的选举，但一年多时间内第二位总统的下台表明，一党制国家内部的闭门权力斗争可能同样残酷。最新信息来自 @bpolitics。
item.description:
Vietnam may not have the polarizing elections that divide many democratic nations, but the ouster of a second president in just over a year shows that closed-door power struggles inside the one-party state can be just as brutal. Latest via @bpolitics.https://t.co/GRXSd7sfEz

— Philip Heijmans (@PJHeijmans) March 21, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称，中国计划主要通过银行间市场公开拍卖而非定向销售的方式发行超长期限主权特别债券。@jdisis 报道
item.description:
China plans to issue its special ultra-long sovereign notes mainly through public auctions in the interbank market rather than through targeted sales, sources say. @jdisis reports https://t.co/wIlWUM9LrV pic.twitter.com/7jkS7qQzbp

— Bloomberg TV (@BloombergTV) March 21, 2024

item.title: 在关闭数十亿美元的对冲基金五年后，这位资深基金经理带着一只更聪明、规模更小的基金回来了。
item.description:
Five years after shutting down a multi-billion dollar hedge fund, this veteran fund manager is back with a fund that's smarter — and a lot smaller, on purpose.
